document.full_text: mets' starter chris young pitched seven sparkling innings, but the bullpen blew a two-run lead as the nationals won in 11 innings.
document.title: nationals 7, mets 3 (11 innings): for mets, relievers' struggles trump a starter's strong effort
lines_and_colors: mets' starter chris young pitched seven sparkling innings, but the bullpen blew a two-run lead as the nationals won in 11 innings.
